alert.note: Alert for Broome; Chemung; Chenango; Delaware; Otsego; Tioga (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 02 at 11:49PM EST by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A SNOW SQUALL WILL AFFECT PARTS OF OTSEGO...CHEMUNG...CHENANGO... TIOGA...BROOME...DELAWARE...SUSQUEHANNA...AND BRADFORD COUNTIES... HAZARDS...A snow squall accompanied by winds of up to 30 MPH which can rapidly reduce visibility to less than one mile. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 1148 PM EST, a snow squall was along a line extending from Cherry Valley to near Millerton and moving southeast at 40 MPH. LOCATIONS IMPACTED INCLUDE... Chemung, Binghamton, Vestal, Johnson City, Oneonta, Endicott, Southport, Barton, Kirkwood and Sayre. This includes the following highway exits... New York Interstate 81 between 1 and 7. Interstate 86/Route 17 between 59 and 84. Interstate 88 between 1 and 19. Pennsylvania Interstate 81 near 230. SAFETY INFO... Use extra caution if you must travel into or through this squall. Rapid changes in visibility and potentially slick roads may lead to accidents. &&

area.areaDesc: Broome; Chemung; Chenango; Delaware; Otsego; Tioga
